title: Circular for four-day work week, issued
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Public Administration, Home Affairs, Provincial Councils and Local Government has issued the circular enabling Public Officers to stay at home for one day and engage in Agricultural Activities.

According to the Circular, its provisions will not be applicable for institutions which provide essential services, such as water, electricity, health, defense, education, transport, ports and airports.
The Cabinet approved the recent decision taken to implement this measure.
